snippet.title: Swift 4.2 Draw Something with CGContext and Canvas View
snippet.description:
Let's learn how to create a drawing application by implementing our own Canvas view. This canvas will implement tracking of our fingers through touchesBegan and touchesMoved.  It'll be a lot of fun and a brief escape from standard UITableView and UICollectionView components. Enjoy.
